humanum_full_description_en:
Oracle from three horizontal lines , like clouds in the sky. " Qi " is an ancient word for " qi ", and its original meaning is cloud qi . "Said the text": "Gas, gas, gas who also belong to the pictographic all from the air..." Today " gas simplified characters" as " gas " is the use of ancient words.

Because the font is similar to the " three ", the upper and lower pictures were later written in curved shapes to distinguish them.

Oracle bone inscriptions are often used as adverbs to indicate final, final, and final (Shen Pei). The Collection of 12532 is: "Wang Zhan said: "Suspicious rain." The day will allow rain." It means that the king made predictions about Bu Zhao : "This Bo Zhao (show) will eventually rain." It really rained on that day. And as a preposition, to express, to "South Tuen" 2366: "wine Gas Day", " Day ", " wine " are offering name, which means the day when the offering would be the wine festival.

Bronze inscription means begging, Huanzi Meng Jianghu: "Use Qi (begging) for life", which means to pray for good orders. Pang Gong Yanding: "Use Qi (begging) to spend (Mi) longevity, ten thousand years will not be strong (Jiangxi)", which means to pray for the end of life, to enjoy the days and years, indefinitely. It is also read as "è®«", which means the end and the death of heaven: "Pi Keqi (è®«) Yi (Yin) Wang Si", that is, the end of the sacrifice of the Yin King, that is, the destruction of the Shang Dynasty. "Shang Shu. "Xibo Kanli": "The heavens take my fate."

The bamboo slips of the Warring States Period are pronounced as " steam ", which means that they are almost and will be. Zhouyi Jian 44: "Qi (steam) Zhi, Yimu (Wu) Xiaojing, Qianqi (qi) bottle, fierce", Wang Bi's "Zhou Yi. "Jing Gua" is written as "When the steam arrives, the well is not broken, and the bottle is fierce." It means that the drawing bottle is overturned and crashed before the well head is about to go out of the well. (Chen Guying) . It is also pronounced as " to date ", which means as to, to reach, "Tsinghua Jane 1." "Imperial Gate" Jane 2: "Qi (until) and (you) Bao (Fu)", "Yi Zhou Shu. "Imperial Gate" as "Fu also has Fu." The main idea is to win the trust of the people.

" Gas " After the guise expressed beg, pray, indicating that the meaning of " gas " and later save as " begging ." Duan Yucai "Shuowen Jiezi Annotation": "Qi, Qi ancient and modern characters. Since the word "qi" is used as the cloud qi word, it is also used as the word "liqi". Qi is the cloud of qi. The extension is the body of qi." To use the qi to fake the qi from others, and to save begging."
